item.title: Delete item when teleporting
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

[quote=“Door, post:5, topic:311326”]for example i have this:

        		deleteItem(1619[b], 1[/b]);[/quote]

Forget the GetItemSlot thing, you only need

deleteItem(1839, 1);

Which is

deleteItem(id, amount);

Read full topic

item.title: Delete item when teleporting
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

cannot find symbol

It can’t find the symbol maybe?

Either add that deleteItem method, or use the one that probably exists, which is:

deleteItem(id, slot, amount);

Use it as:

deleteItem(1839, GetItemSlot(1839), 1);

As for the

client.java:16287:

The number is the line number the problem is at. You can hold control and press G to open the go to line box, and type in the number to be taken there.

Hope I helped. If not, post back and I’ll try to assist you further.

Read full topic

item.title: Delete item when teleporting
item.dc:creator: @Door Door
item.description:
@Door wrote:

Can someone please tell me what is wrong with this:

case 4146: // falador teleport triggerTele(2964, 3378, 0, false); if (playerHasItem(1839)) { deleteItem(1839); } break;

and this is what i get when i try to compile:

client.java:16287: cannot find symbol symbol : method deleteItem(int) location: class client deleteItem(1839); ^

Note: I put the deleteItem code into all my teleports, and so get 15 of the errors. In the ‘client.java:#####’ the numbers are different for each error.

-Mark-

Read full topic
